resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #4d5156; font-family: arial, sans-serif;">Leonard Bridgman's atmospheric wash paintings with Oliver Stewart's lively commentary on these Great War machines make this an aviation classic. Originall published in 1938.
